comments.body:
@jschueller I suggest you add the following command "test" to that help debug issues in the future:

``` yaml
    commands:
        - conda inspect linkages -n _test otrobopt  # [not win]
        - conda inspect objects -n _test otrobopt  # [osx]
```

They are not really package tests but you can inspect how the package linking to other libs and the objects in them.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +50,54 @@test:
  imports:
    - otrobopt
  commands:
    - conda inspect linkages -n _test otrobopt  # [not win]
